content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
what would you do
when faced with regret?
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
In a disconnected world bubble somewhere,
I found a special cyan-colored seasoning,
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Unfortunately, during one performance,
I lost it.
And that world bubble... I could never find it again.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Put it in the drift box?
That's actually a good idea worth trying.
I'll think of it as a gift sent to a faraway friend.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
I'll do as you say, and take that "regret,"
Pack it into a drifting box,
And let it float along the river in the sky.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Like a fading memory,
Later, I frantically searched through recordings of the masked figure,
But I could never recreate that first fleeting impression.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
But all of this
is nothing more than a shallow nostalgia
for that regretful moment!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Come to think of it, it's not about "regret" anymore,
but about "passing it on"!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Of course, I couldn't help but hide a surprise inside!
Anyway, the moment it was released,
That color really appeared in the sky!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Ah, I feel like there's something I wanted to tell you,
But I've forgotten it again.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
I came to thank you!
You taught me to leave my blue regrets in my dreams!
Thanks to you, I really saw that blue in my dreams!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
To preserve that shade of blue-green,
I've been experimenting with all sorts of colors.
Even my attire deliberately mirrors that same blue-green hue.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content: Save it as a beautiful dream
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Well then, let me continue in this dream—
Let this azure dream go on!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Do you remember what you suggested to me last time?
About that blue-green regret.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Now, when I look at the sky,
I no longer feel any regret.
Thank you, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
And what's more! Because it was played so many times,
even the video tape broke down.
It remains one of my biggest regrets to this day.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
when faced with regrets,
what advice would you give?
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
This regret...
Even if I wanted to forget it,
I guess that would be pretty hard to do.
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Ah yes, yes! I learned this amazing backwards dance move...
In my dreams.
Oh right, right, now I remember!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
Just one more glimpse was all I needed,
And I'd never forget again!
That's what I thought, and it really came true!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊
闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
That paint is quite special.
The cyan mask it creates has a soul-stirring beauty.
Like sunlight breaking through after a rainy sky, flowing light!
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content: Seal it up and toss it into the drift box
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊

content:
<size=30>I mean,
my chances of getting empty drifting boxes also went up!</size>
info: 闲聊-链式闲聊-话题B（两段）-1003乐福_选项闲聊
